deal.title: Seiko SKX007 Automatic Dive Watch - Modded

beats.label: hook
beats.text: Alright watch lovers, stop scrolling for a second! I've got a deal that's too good to gatekeep. You are NOT going to believe this price.

beats.label: deal
beats.text: I found a Seiko SKX007, the iconic automatic dive watch, on eBay for just $280. And get this, it's already been modded to look even better!

beats.label: value
beats.text: These typically go for way more, especially with the mods. The condition is listed as good, so we're talking a killer deal on a timeless classic. This is a serious value proposition.

beats.label: cta
